i.name: Icathian Surprise
i.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

q.name: Caustic Spittle
q.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

w.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
w.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

e.name: Void Ooze
e.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

r.name: Living Artillery
r.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

riot.name: Icathian Surprise
riot.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

i1.name: Icathian Surprise
i1.blurb: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon taking [[death|fatal damage]], '''Kog'Maw''' remains active for 4 seconds, becoming {{tip|pacify|pacified}}, {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}}, {{tip|untargetable}} and gaining up to {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} over the duration. He then explodes, dealing {{as|{{pp|125 to 550}} {{sti|true damage|link=yes}}}} to all nearby enemies.
notes: * '''Kog'Maw''' is cleansed of all debuffs upon triggering ''Icathian Surprise''.
* {{ii|Guardian Angel}} and {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} will take precedence over ''Icathian Surprise''.
** {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} Dying while affected by {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} allows '''Kog'Maw''' to trigger ''Icathian Suprise'' immediately and then a second time right after he revives.
* After ''Icathian Surprise'' ends, the corpse of '''Kog'Maw''' will retain body block despite being dead on the ground.

riot.name: Caustic Spittle
riot.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains {{ e2 }}% bonus attack speed.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

q1.name: Caustic Spittle
q1.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
q1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' launches a corrosive projectile in a target direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy it hits and reducing their {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds.

riot.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
riot.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
riot.tooltip: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal {{ e2 }}% <scaleAP>(+{{ f1 }})%</scaleAP> of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

w1.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
w1.blurb: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} For the next 8 seconds, '''Kog'Maw's''' basic attacks gain {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} and deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[On-hit effect|on-hit]], capped at 100 against minions and monsters.
w1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Range|{{ap|130 to 210}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|3 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
notes: * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but does not affect structures.
* ''Bio-Arcane Barrage's'' bonus damage will not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} but will do so with {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}}.

riot.name: Void Ooze
riot.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
riot.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in it by {{ e2 }}%.

e1.name: Void Ooze
e1.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' spews a ball of ooze in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies for 1 second.
e1.description2: The ooze lingers for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within the area for an additional {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

riot.name: Living Artillery
riot.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
riot.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for {{ basedamagecalc }} to {{ middamagecalc }} magic damage based on their missing health.

If enemies are below 40% health, they take {{ maxdamagecalc }} magic damage instead.

Each subsequent shot within {{ manacostduration }} seconds costs {{ basecost }} more Mana (max {{ manacostcap }}).

r1.name: Living Artillery
r1.blurb: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' launches a ball of acid into the air that drops after {{fd|0.6}} seconds at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|type=target's '''missing''' health|11|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0 to 60|formula=0.833% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health. ''This is capped at 50% increase at 60% '''missing''' health.''}}|health}}, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds.
r1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 180 3}} {{as|(+ 65% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Increased Magic Damage|{{ap|100*1.5 to 180*1.5 3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|97.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|100*2 to 180*2 3}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
r1.description2: ''Living Artillery's'' damage is doubled against enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|40% '''maximum''' health}}}}. Each subsequent ''Living Artillery'' within the next 8 seconds costs an additional {{as|{{sti|mana|40 mana}}}}, capping at {{as|{{sti|mana|400 per cast}}|mana}}.
notes: * On cast ''Living Artillery'' grants slight {{tip|sight}} of the target area.
* ''Living Artillery'' will not reveal [[stealth]]ed champions (can still damage them).
